channel.title: CVE Feed for Sierra Designs -- Z-Wave
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sierra Designs -- Z-Wave

item.title: CVE-2013-20003|2024-08-06T18:09:17.060Z -- sierra%20designs -- z-wave
item.description: Z-Wave devices from Sierra Designs (circa 2013) and Silicon Labs (using S0 security) may use a known, shared network key of all zeros, allowing an attacker within radio range to spoof Z-Wave traffic.
